name: Samsung Galaxy S20 Dual Sim 128GB
title: Samsung Galaxy S20 (SM-G980F/DS) Dual SIM 128GB, Factory Unlocked GSM, International Version

About.itemDesc: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint
Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items
Device may come with foreign charger however seller will provide a US travel socket separately

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Most Unreal Phone ive ever had!
Reviews.ReviewDesc: This phone is not a phone its a computer in yer pocket. its so great! I am not a phone guy, and bought because my daughter, and friends, co workers, etc said its hard impossible to get a hold of me. My old phone was so slow. This has it all, definate buy. I even checked a youtube video on side by side comparison of Xynos and Snapdragon phone and they are basically the same. I keep finding new features with this thing. The super fast charging is epic. I dont know where to start, but this is a definite MUST BUY if you need a phone. I hope there is some left.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Didn't work
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It loaded up, took all my info from google, and then turned off and never turned back on. Tried everything, left it on the charger for a couple hours, it doesn’t charge. Tried hard reset, nothing. Junk, don’t buy!

Reviews.ReviewTitle: High end at a good price! The best Android on the market
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Excellent cell phone, it has everything and at a very good price on Amazon, arrived earlier than established.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Love this phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: I LOVE this phone ❤ battery life awesome, pictures turn out great, and its so pretty lol. I am so happy with this phone, definitely worth the money.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Exynos chipset (know what you are buying)
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Careful before you purchase this, this model is the exynos chipset model that's why it's a tiny bit cheaper than usual. Just a heads up any who see's this knows what they are paying for.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: This phone is easy to use
Reviews.ReviewDesc: My wife she loves this phone.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Expensive but practical
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It's expensive and not a blackberry but I really had no choice since there isn't a new blackberry out there. I'm worried about security on this device. So far it is decent but I was expecting more for my $.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Excellent product-price ratio
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Good product, I got it fast and in good condition, the cell phone works very well, only the battery does not last all day in normal use but I think that's all galaxy. The seller is very attentive.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Slow phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Seems like this phone went backwards in updates. Operates slowly. The camera is the worst i have ever had. My s8 and the a5 have great cameras. With 20 you need to retake photos constantly. Very often you miss your shot because of this. Photos are blurry and garbage. Like the selfie camera is amazing you can see every pore. But actual camera is useless. Dont even use it for road trips or anything really. I regret choosing this . God awful.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Good cell phone but with a peculiar theme
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It is an amazing cell phone, it shows the quality of screen, photography and is good size for one-handed operation. The reason I put it 4 stars is because its charger does not do its function. I tried to use it as soon as I opened the package and it didn't work. The strange thing is that this new charger if it charges my S10 and it is also strange because other old chargers and the same charger of the s10 manage to charge the S20.

Reviews.ReviewDesc: Excellent cell phone, it has everything and at a very good price on Amazon, arrived earlier than established.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Love this phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: I LOVE this phone ❤ battery life awesome, pictures turn out great, and its so pretty lol. I am so happy with this phone, definitely worth the money.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Exynos chipset (know what you are buying)
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Careful before you purchase this, this model is the exynos chipset model that's why it's a tiny bit cheaper than usual. Just a heads up any who see's this knows what they are paying for.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: This phone is easy to use
Reviews.ReviewDesc: My wife she loves this phone.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Expensive but practical
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It's expensive and not a blackberry but I really had no choice since there isn't a new blackberry out there. I'm worried about security on this device. So far it is decent but I was expecting more for my $.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Excellent product-price ratio
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Good product, I got it fast and in good condition, the cell phone works very well, only the battery does not last all day in normal use but I think that's all galaxy. The seller is very attentive.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Slow phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Seems like this phone went backwards in updates. Operates slowly. The camera is the worst i have ever had. My s8 and the a5 have great cameras. With 20 you need to retake photos constantly. Very often you miss your shot because of this. Photos are blurry and garbage. Like the selfie camera is amazing you can see every pore. But actual camera is useless. Dont even use it for road trips or anything really. I regret choosing this . God awful.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Good cell phone but with a peculiar theme
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It is an amazing cell phone, it shows the quality of screen, photography and is good size for one-handed operation. The reason I put it 4 stars is because its charger does not do its function. I tried to use it as soon as I opened the package and it didn't work. The strange thing is that this new charger if it charges my S10 and it is also strange because other old chargers and the same charger of the s10 manage to charge the S20.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Excellent product-price ratio
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Good product, I got it fast and in good condition, the cell phone works very well, only the battery does not last all day in normal use but I think that's all galaxy. The seller is very attentive.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Slow phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Seems like this phone went backwards in updates. Operates slowly. The camera is the worst i have ever had. My s8 and the a5 have great cameras. With 20 you need to retake photos constantly. Very often you miss your shot because of this. Photos are blurry and garbage. Like the selfie camera is amazing you can see every pore. But actual camera is useless. Dont even use it for road trips or anything really. I regret choosing this . God awful.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Good cell phone but with a peculiar theme
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It is an amazing cell phone, it shows the quality of screen, photography and is good size for one-handed operation. The reason I put it 4 stars is because its charger does not do its function. I tried to use it as soon as I opened the package and it didn't work. The strange thing is that this new charger if it charges my S10 and it is also strange because other old chargers and the same charger of the s10 manage to charge the S20.

name: Seneo Wireless Charger
title: Seneo Wireless Charger, 3 in 1 Wireless Charging Station

About.itemDesc: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint
Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items
Device may come with foreign charger however seller will provide a US travel socket separately

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Most Unreal Phone ive ever had!
Reviews.ReviewDesc: This phone is not a phone its a computer in yer pocket. its so great! I am not a phone guy, and bought because my daughter, and friends, co workers, etc said its hard impossible to get a hold of me. My old phone was so slow. This has it all, definate buy. I even checked a youtube video on side by side comparison of Xynos and Snapdragon phone and they are basically the same. I keep finding new features with this thing. The super fast charging is epic. I dont know where to start, but this is a definite MUST BUY if you need a phone. I hope there is some left.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Didn't work
Reviews.ReviewDesc: It loaded up, took all my info from google, and then turned off and never turned back on. Tried everything, left it on the charger for a couple hours, it doesn’t charge. Tried hard reset, nothing. Junk, don’t buy!

Reviews.ReviewTitle: High end at a good price! The best Android on the market
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Excellent cell phone, it has everything and at a very good price on Amazon, arrived earlier than established.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Love this phone
Reviews.ReviewDesc: I LOVE this phone ❤ battery life awesome, pictures turn out great, and its so pretty lol. I am so happy with this phone, definitely worth the money.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: Exynos chipset (know what you are buying)
Reviews.ReviewDesc: Careful before you purchase this, this model is the exynos chipset model that's why it's a tiny bit cheaper than usual. Just a heads up any who see's this knows what they are paying for.

Reviews.ReviewTitle: This phone is easy to use
Reviews.ReviewDesc: My wife she loves this phone.
